item.title: Exact, Tractable Gauss-Newton Optimization in Deep Reversible Architectures Reveal Poor Generalization
item.description: Exact Gauss-Newton optimization in deep reversible networks surprisingly reveals poor generalization, despite faster training, challenging existing deep learning optimization theories.
